amendment.description: Amendment provides $30 million to the State-side program of the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 6 and printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Land and Water Conservation Fund state-side grant program by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 202 (Roll no. 281).
